hero.headline: How to Use YouTube Community Posts
hero.subheadline: Stay visible between uploads. Engage your audience directly.

sections.content: The Community tab keeps you connected between uploads. Text, images, polls, and video shares appear in subscriber feeds and can reach non-subscribers through recommendations. Used strategically, community posts maintain momentum and boost channel engagement.

faq.question: When do I get Community tab access?
faq.answer: Available at 500 subscribers. Previously required 1000. Once unlocked, appears as tab on your channel page.

faq.question: How often should I post?
faq.answer: 1-3 times per week is typical. More feels spammy, less loses momentum. Quality over quantity. Post when you have something valuable.

faq.question: What posts get most engagement?
faq.answer: Polls consistently perform bestâ€”low friction to participate. Questions that are easy to answer. Behind-the-scenes photos. Avoid pure self-promotion.

faq.question: Do community posts help with algorithm?
faq.answer: They maintain subscriber engagement which signals active channel. Posts can appear on home feeds. Not direct ranking factor but supports overall channel health.
